subject: Re: JUnit Examples
msgSnippet: I ll defer to others on working with JUnit and Spring.  I have Struts at the moment. With regard to examples,...what have you read so far (online or in
messageBody:
I'll defer to others on working with JUnit and Spring. I have Struts
at the moment.

With regard to examples,...what have you read so far (online or in
books),...what have you tried (have you looked at the sample tests in
the deploy; have you read any books, like JUnit Recipes, or others;
have you googled on JUnit examples - my first page of results provided
some nice sites),...tell us what you have done, that hasn't worked for
you.


Dianne

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Ramkumar Nachimuthu" <nrk150@...> wrote:
>
> Hi any body is working with JUnit and spring framework please reply me.
> also kindly send me how to write JUnit test cases with examples.
> if you send me for facades, magers, controllers and command objects
it will
> be more usefull.
> Thanks and Regards,
> N.Ramkumar
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
